name: __escape__
description:
This is my first game made in unity... kinda.  __escape__ is a  Top-Down 2D RPG Puzzle Game about two worlds and a mysterious place.

I made this short game for the Community Game Jame 2019. Even though the jam lasted for like a week, I could only manage to invest 27 hours in it. It was a super fun experience and I really like the results :D

Someone asked me for a linux version so I put them here
